plot: Two friends (Eric and Jeff) discuss their dreams for the future during a cigarette break. They both want to go in different directions, but can Jeff change Eric's mind keeping him on the same course as himself?
title: Time Takes a Cigarette
plot_es: Two friends (Eric and Jeff) discuss their dreams for the future during a cigarette break. They both want to go in different directions, but can Jeff change Eric's mind keeping him on the same course as himself?
plot_en: Two friends (Eric and Jeff) discuss their dreams for the future during a cigarette break. They both want to go in different directions, but can Jeff change Eric's mind keeping him on the same course as himself?
